title: Invariants and Monovariants in Algebraic Processes
content:
Overview

Define a measure that is preserved (invariant) or strictly decreases (monovariant) under an algebraic operation.

Hard Problem

Start with integers a,b. Replace (a,b) by (|a-b|,\min(a,b)) repeatedly. Show the process ends with (d,d) where d=\gcd(a,b).

Solution Sketch

Use monovariant a+b and invariant \gcd(a,b). Conclude termination and correctness.

def process(a,b):
    seen=0
    while (a,b)!=(0,0) and a!=b and seen<100:
        a,b = (abs(a-b), min(a,b))
        seen+=1
    return a,b
print(process(84,36))
